mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, advice_code, type_code, item_code, item_name, num, unit_code, price, spec, use_code, total_price, is_alone_cost, is_frist_cost, is_appoint_rate, rate_code, insure_list_code from base_advice_detail where id = #{id} and hosp_code=#{hospCode}

select b.id, b.hosp_code, b.advice_code, b.type_code, b.item_code, b.item_name, b.num, b.unit_code as checkUnitCode, b.price as checkPrice, b.spec, b.use_code, b.total_price, b.is_alone_cost, b.is_frist_cost, b.is_appoint_rate, b.rate_code, b.insure_list_code, case b.type_code when '3' then bi.id else bm.id end itemId, case b.type_code when '3' then bi.nation_code else bm.nation_code end nation_code, case b.type_code when '3' then bi.nation_name else bm.nation_name end nation_name, case b.type_code when '3' then bi.unit_code else bm.unit_code end unit_code, case b.type_code when '3' then bi.price else bm.price end price, case b.type_code when '3' then bi.unit_code else bm.split_unit_code end split_unit_code, case b.type_code when '3' then bi.price else bm.split_price end split_price, case b.type_code when '3' then bi.type_code else bm.type_code end itemTypeCode, case b.type_code when '3' then bi.out_dept_code else '' end out_dept_code, case b.type_code when '3' then bi.in_dept_code else '' end in_dept_code, case b.type_code when '3' then ( select name from base_dept where code = bi.out_dept_code) else '' end outDeptName, case b.type_code when '3' then ( select name from base_dept where code = bi.in_dept_code) else '' end inDeptName, case b.type_code when '3' then '3' else '2' end typeCode, ( select name from base_rate where base_rate.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and b.rate_code = base_rate.code)as rateName from base_advice_detail b left join base_item bi on b.item_code = bi.code and bi.is_valid = '1' and b.hosp_code = bi.hosp_code left join base_material bm on b.item_code = bm.code and bm.is_valid = '1' and b.hosp_code = bm.hosp_code where b.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and b.advice_code = #{code}
SELECT a.* FROM base_advice_detail a,base_advice b WHERE a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and b.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND b.id = #{id} and a.advice_code = b.code
mapper.insert:
insert into base_advice_detail(id,hosp_code, advice_code, type_code, item_code, item_name, num, unit_code, price, spec, use_code, total_price, is_alone_cost, is_frist_cost, is_appoint_rate, rate_code, insure_list_code) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode}, #{item.adviceCode}, #{item.typeCode}, #{item.itemCode}, #{item.itemName}, #{item.num}, #{item.checkUnitCode}, #{item.checkPrice}, #{item.spec}, #{item.useCode}, #{item.totalPrice}, #{item.isAloneCost}, #{item.isFristCost}, #{item.isAppointRate}, #{item.rateCode}, #{item.insureListCode})
